Name: zinc sulfide production | sulfuric acid | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: Production from zinc monosulfate and sodium sulfide, assuming a yield of 100%. Zinc sulphide is produced by precipitation out of a solution according to the following stoechiometric equation:;ZnSO4.H2O  +  Na2S    ->    ZnS  +  Na2SO4  +  H2O
